call_to_action.title: Empower your health journey with HWC
call_to_action.description: PSMRI AMRIT HWC is a digital health platform developed by the Piramal Swasthya Management Research Institute (PSMRI) to enhance healthcare delivery in India. It stands for Accessible Medical Records via Integrated Technology Health and Wellness Center. The platform aims to connect beneficiaries, health facilities, and the healthcare workforce in an integrated ecosystem through technology.

params.footer_description: Integrated with ABDM, empowering healthcare services through digital transformation.
params.location: 3rd Floor,  No. 6-3-1112 AWFIS Oyster Complex, Greenlands Road Somajiguda, Begumpet Hyderabad – 500016, India.
